entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 02:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 then light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
